title: Microsoft Keeps Its Finance Head Count Flat With AI, Bots and Other Tech - The Wall Street Journal
content: Microsoft Keeps Its Finance Head Count Flat With AI, Bots and Other Tech  The Wall Street Journal
description: Cory Hrncirik, who leads Microsoft’s Modern Finance initiative, told WSJ’s CFO Journal about the tools the company is using to streamline and simplify finance work, and why the organization still uses Excel for some tasks.
